title: HITCH Android Application
description: ‘Hitch’ is a Bluetooth based tag, whose proximity to the user can be tracked using an Android application
Create the initial Android application in Java to register and connect to ‘Hitch’ devices
Create tracking algorithms to keep track of device location and signal strength, and alert the user accordingly

title: Web Data Management Project – ‘SayItRight’ Events Organization Web App
description: To create a responsive web application where users with different access types can create ‘Events’ as well as RSVP to existing events (like Facebook Events)
Development using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, PHP, CodeIgniter, MySQL, and WordPress
Create tracking algorithms to keep track of device location and signal strength, and alert the user accordingly

title: UTA MAC Facility Maintenance Ticketing System
description: Lead a team of 5 to create a maintenance ticketing system for the UTA Maverick Activity Center (MAC), and perform unit testing and integration testing on the complete web application
Development using Java, Spring MVC, JSP, JDBC and MySQL, Unit testing using JUnit, JaCoCo and PIT Mutation testing tool, and Integration testing using Selenium with Java

title: Data Mining Project - Movie Search and Classifier
description: Implement a search engine and classifier for movies using the MovieLens dataset, and image captioner and image caption search engine using MS-COCO 2014 dataset
Project was implemented from scratch in Python, using NumPy and NLTK libraries, and hosted using Flask

title: SE 1 Project - CampusCarRental Android Application
description: Lead a team of 6 to design and create a Car Rental Android application that lets the users rent a car, by following the Software Engineering principles learned in class
